title:
Mr. Cat Update

Mr. Cat was rescued from a California house fire. He’s on Day Four of healing!!! Tod
content:
Mr. Cat Update

Mr. Cat was rescued from a California house fire. He’s on Day Four of healing!!! Today at the vet he had his bandages switched out on all four of his paws. 
Thank you for the donations of wet food, Churu, and financial donations towards his vet bills!

title: A resident was found dead after a pre‑dawn house fire in Oceanside, CA. Responders say the victim’s
content:
A resident was found dead after a pre‑dawn house fire in Oceanside, CA. Responders say the victim’s injuries weren’t from the fire.

Read more: https://buildlikenew.com/one-person-dead-in-california-early-morning-house-fire/… 

#Oceanside #HouseFire #FireSafety #BuildLikeNew

content:
That’s true!  And those fires were right in the deepest blue area of Southern California.  

I guess nothing focuses a democrat’s mind on new leadership like watching your house burn down because the fire hydrant at the curb, 10 yards away, was dry??

title: On Monday, July 21, 2025, at approximately 3:30 p.m., Winn Parish Fire District #3 responded to a ho
content: On Monday, July 21, 2025, at approximately 3:30 p.m., Winn Parish Fire District #3 responded to a house fire in the 1000 block of Louisiana Highway 1232 in Winnfield, which claimed the life of a 51-year-old woman #WinnParish
